sentences.en: Can be premature ejaculation treated really?
sentences.cn: 能治.早泄真的能治 吗 ?

sentences.en: Female ejaculation is a perfectly normal phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 女性身体有体液排出是再正常不过的现象了.

sentences.en: If this action is impaired, hemorrhage, premature ejaculation, spontaneous sweating , urinary incontinence, and spermatorrhea will occur.
sentences.cn: 如果此功能受损, 将会出现出血 、 早泄 、 自汗 、 遗尿和遗精.

sentences.en: It is suitable for people with premature ejaculation, impotence and other sexual dysfunction, weak erectile.
sentences.cn: 适用于患有早泄 、 阳痿及其它性功能减退 、 勃起无力的人群.

sentences.en: Premature Ejaculation ( PE ) is most common sexual dysfunction in men.
sentences.cn: 早泄 ( PE ) 是男性最常见的性功能障碍.

sentences.en: Question How does the pill help with Premature Ejaculation?
sentences.cn: 问题是如何帮助丸早泄?

sentences.en: To investigate the effects of Zaoxiting spray in the treatment of patients with premature ejaculation.
sentences.cn: 目的为了研究、观察早息停喷雾剂治疗早泄的效果.

sentences.en: Very occasionally, premature ejaculation results from a physical condition as a urinary tract or prostate infection.
sentences.cn: 有时早泄是因为身体原因,例如尿道或前列腺感染.

sentences.en: WONDERFUL – K, was designed to treat undersized sexual organs premature ejaculation, and impotence in men.
sentences.cn: 奇妙-钾, 是治疗矮小的性器官,早泄和阳痿的男性.
